full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO GSANG SGRUB YID BZHIN NOR BU'I GTOR SGRUB YID BZHIN DBANG GI RGYAL PO'I GTER MDZOD CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
